name: Planetary Control
description: Planetary Control is a 4 month advanced game design project. The game features isometric strategy gameplay mixed with third person shooting combat. During the players turn they can move their units around in isometric view and each unit has its own upgradable stats, health and energy. When they attack an enemy unit with one of their own the game transitions to third person combat between the two units. Each players controls their own unit for the duration of the fight and then the game transitions back to isometric turn based combat. The players goal is to eliminate all enemy units or destroy their base.
